meta.name: description
meta.content: Cumberland Academy comprises of the Leadership Academy, Elementary School, Middle School and a High School. The schools are located at Tyler, Texas.

div.marquee: School closed until the end of this 2020 school year due to COVID-19 mitigation. See "recent news" for more details.

div.div: Cumberland Academy is a tuition free charter school and strives to achieve its vision to empower student success by providing a nurturing environment that inspires lifelong learning while using innovative technology to develop 21st century skills and fostering an appreciation of the arts. Small class sizes and knowledgeable, dedicated teachers provide personalized attention to enable students to achieve their maximum potential.
